resources.string: Share this Android for another user to see
To begin sharing your screen, give the access code below to the person who will be assisting you.
Or send them a link to access your screen:
Or invite them to share their screen with a link:
The remote user is able to view your screen and draw on it. You can end the session any time from the notification panel.
Enable the microphone to start a voice chat.
Ask the user whose Android you wish to access to click "Share" and give you the access code.
There was an error while connecting to Inkwire servers.
Another Inkwire user wants to share their screen with you.
Inkwire session not found. It may have expired.
You are viewing a shared screen.
Another Inkwire user invited you to share your screen.
You were disconnected from the shared screen.
Are you sure you want to exit this screen sharing session?
The remote user can hear you now
The remote user can\'t hear you
You must grant Inkwire permission to draw over other applications to see where your screen sharing participant is clicking.
